actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The solar attacks twice with its holy sword.

actions.name: Holy Sword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (4d6 + 9) slashing damage plus 21 (6d6) radiant damage.

actions.name: Column of Flame
actions.desc: Flame erupts in a 10-foot-radius  30-foot-tall cylinder centered on a point the solar can see within 60 feet of it. Each creature in the area makes a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw  taking 21 (6d6) fire damage and 21 (6d6) radiant damage of a failure  or half as much damage on a success.

reactions.name: Forceful Parry (While Bloodied)
reactions.desc: When a creature misses the solar with a melee attack, the solars parrying sword sparks with energy. The attacker takes 21 (6d6) lightning damage and makes a DC 24 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, it is pushed 10 feet away and falls prone.

legendary_actions.name: The solar can take 3 legendary actions
legendary_actions.desc: Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creatures turn. The solar regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Teleport
legendary_actions.desc: The solar magically teleports up to 120 feet to an empty space it can see.

legendary_actions.name: Heal (3/Day)
legendary_actions.desc: The solar touches a creature other than itself, magically healing 60 hit points of damage and ending any blindness, curse, deafness, disease, or poison on the target.

legendary_actions.name: Deafening Command (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The solar speaks an echoing command. Each creature of the solars choice within 30 feet that can hear the solar and understands a language makes a DC 24 Charisma saving throw. Each creature that succeeds on the saving throw takes 21 (6d6) thunder damage. Each creature that fails its saving throw immediately takes a certain action, depending on the solars command. This is a magical charm effect.

legendary_actions.name: Abase yourself! The creature falls prone
Approach! The creature must use its reaction
Flee! The creature must use its reaction
Surrender! The creature drops anything it is holding

special_abilities.name: Champion of Truth
special_abilities.desc: The solar automatically detects lies. Additionally, it cannot lie.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc: The solars spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 25). The solar can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: 1/day each: commune, control weather, resurrection
